channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Apple starts testing end-to-end encrypted RCS messages on iPhone
item.description: Apple is starting to test end-to-end encrypted (E2EE) RCS messages with the developer beta of iOS 26.4 released Monday. Apple announced plans last year to support the feature, and once fully available, it will let iPhone and Android users send encrypted RCS messages to each other across platforms. However, with this initial implementation, Apple is […]...

item.title: Jikipedia Makes Falling into an Epstein Rabbit Hole Easier Than Ever
item.description: A newly released AI-backed resource by the creators of JMail puts the trove of ghastly files in a familiar, contextualizing, time-sucking format.

item.title: 5 of the best news apps for Android, whether you want original reporting or powerful aggregators
item.description: From Reuters to Readly, these are five of the best news apps on Android, with ideal options no matter what kind of news you're looking for.

item.title: The best noise-canceling earbuds for 2026
item.description: Noise-canceling earbuds have become an everyday essential for a lot of people, whether you’re trying to survive a noisy commute, concentrate in a shared workspace or just carve out a little quiet time. Advances in active noise cancellation and audio processing mean today’s best earbuds do a much better job of cutting through background noise, without forcing you to move up to bulky over-ear headphones.The latest models also balance sound quality with convenience, offering stable Bluetooth connections, comfortable fits and battery life that can last through a full day with help from their charg...

item.title: How Mamoru Hosoda Reforged ‘Hamlet’ Into an Anime About Choosing Life Over Revenge
item.description: Studio Chizu's 'Scarlet' follows a medieval princess fighting through purgatory to avenge her father.

item.title: Toyota says it’s going all-in on battery electric cars with four new battery models, but is it too late?
item.description: After resisting battery electric vehicles for years, Toyota goes all-in on EV with four new models due by 2027.

item.title: These are the trendiest kind of camera straps this Presidents' Day, but there’s a catch
item.description: Rope camera straps are the trendiest accessory, but read this before buying one of my recommendations this Presidents' Day

item.title: I can't imagine life without these 6 PlayStation Portal accessories — and I'm eyeing up 4 more, too
item.description: Looking for PlayStation Portal accessory ideas? Here are six I can't live without, and three I'm going to buy next.

item.title: Netflix is about to stop working on some more older smart TVs and consoles — but handily, you can get a Roku or Fire TV Stick super-cheap right now
item.description: Netflix is ending support for its app on the PS3 and some older TVs and set-top boxes – but streaming sticks are cheap right now, if you want to keep your old set

item.title: 'I think we’re going to have a human-level performance on most, if not all, professional tasks': Microsoft AI chief thinks AI will replace most white-collar work in the 12 to 18 months - so is this the end for human workers?
item.description: Is AI coming for white-collar roles next? Microsoft's AI boss thinks so.

item.title: Walmart is practically begging you to buy LG's award-winning C5 OLED TV — it's $1,500 off and an absolute bargain
item.description: Thanks to Walmart's Presidents' Day sale, our best-rated TV, LG's 65-inch C5 OLED TV, is at its lowest price ever, with a massive $1,500 discount.

item.title: 7 Presidents’ Day sales on TVs we highly recommended — from LG, Samsung, TCL and more
item.description: Don't miss these great chances for a home theater upgrade — top OLED and big-screen TVs are back to Black Friday prices

item.title: OpenAI Just Hired the OpenClaw Guy, and Now You Have to Learn Who He Is
item.description: Austrian developer and former entrepreneur Peter Steinberger is largely responsible for the recent frenzy over AI agents.

item.title: Apple rattrape son retard face à YouTube et Spotify pour les podcasts vidéo
item.description: Apple (re)découvre le podcast vidéo. Le constructeur a dévoilé une nouvelle version de son application Podcasts qui prend désormais bien mieux en charge les vidéos, tout en facilitant la vie des spectateurs et des créateurs.

item.title: Apple’s Podcasts app will let you ‘seamlessly’ switch between audio and video shows
item.description: Apple is upgrading its Podcasts app to let users "seamlessly" swap between audio and video podcasts using its HTTP Live Streaming (HLS) technology. While listening to a show, users will be able to switch to a horizontal video version of the podcast and download the video versions of a podcast for offline viewing. By giving […]

item.title: Origine de la vie : des indices venus de l’espace bousculent les théories classiques
item.description: Bien des scénarios sur l'origine de la vie sur Terre la font naître dans un environnement chaud avec de l'eau liquide, notamment dans les océans de la Terre primitive et peut-être déjà pendant l'éon géologique de l'Hadéen, il y a plus de 4 milliards d'années. Et si l'on se trompait ? C'est...

item.title: This little gadget turned me into a morning person by opening my bedroom blinds automatically — and it's on sale for Presidents' Day
item.description: There's no need to splash out on expensive smart blinds when the SwitchBot Blind Tilt can do the same thing for a fraction of the price.

item.title: Switch 2 price, PS6 release could be impacted by memory shortage
item.description: Sony may be delaying the PlayStation 6, while Nintendo is contemplating a price increase for the Switch 2.

item.title: There are so many cheap Nintendo Switch 2 accessories on sale this Presidents' Day — here are six I strongly recommend while discounts last
item.description: Amazon's Presidents' Day sale is a real who's who of Nintendo Switch 2 accessory discounts.

item.title: Who needs Ring? This top-rated video doorbell is subscription-free, and it's less than half price in the Presidents' Day sale at Amazon
item.description: Get "clear, super-detailed footage" and package alerts, plus 16GB storage and AI person-detection if you add the Eufy Homebase hub.

item.title: La Fnac et Darty bradent à -30 % ce moniteur 500 Hz parfait pour les joueurs compétitifs sur PC
item.description: Les écrans à 500 Hz sont peu nombreux sur le marché, alors quand l'un d'eux est en promotion, ça vaut le détour de s'y intéresser. C'est le cas du MSI MAG 272QP qui affiche une dalle QD-OLED à 500 Hz pour 699 euros au lieu de 949 euros de base.

item.title: Have money, will travel: a16z’s hunt for the next European unicorn
item.description: According to a16z, it has eyes around the world in order to spot companies as early as local funds might.

item.title: Stockage d’énergie et STEP : pourquoi EDF mise encore des milliards sur cette technologie « à l’ancienne »
item.description: Les centrales hydroélectriques ne servent pas uniquement à produire de l’électricité. Certaines peuvent aussi faire office de batteries géantes, indispensables à l’équilibre du réseau électrique.
